snippet.title: The Way of Life - Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is a short trailer of our game, done in 48 hours for the GGJ 2014
Play FREE on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/310370/The_Way_of_Life_Free_Edition/


Hope you'll like it my friends :)

Sorry for the low resolution, we had very little time for the trailer too!
